description:
This card can only be used on your 5th turn or later.
I. Starting from this turn, whenever a discard effect activates from your opponent's cards, put a Twofold Defence into your hand.
This effect lasts for the whole match and can't be stacked.
name: Silent Preparations

description:
I. Put an Aegis Reinforcement and a Sacrificial Guardianship into your hand. 
II. This card will not end your turn.
name: Twofold Defence

description:
I. Select a one of your chess pieces, that piece ignores all captures and removal from Spells for 1 turn.
II. You can choose to play an extra card after this card is played.
name: Aegis Reinforcement

description:
I. Select one of your Pawns, it loses the ability to capture pieces and gains the following effect:
- The next time another enemy chess piece captures another piece, this piece will be captured instead.
II. You can choose to play an extra card after this card is played.
name: Sacrificial Guardianship

description: I. Return a piece to where it was 1 turn ago.
name: Chrono Slipstream

description:
I. Select an enemy Bishop, Rook, Knight or Queen, the selected type for both players receive the following effects:
- Can't move for the next 2 turns.
- Ignores all captures and removals from Spells targeted towards this piece.
This card can't be used if you don't have the same type of piece as the selected piece.
name: Crippling Indestructibility

description: I. Remove a chess piece that neglect captures and removal from card effects. This card ignores spells that disallows the piece from being removed through card effects.
name: Become Mortal

description:
This card can only be used on your 15th turn or later.
I. Your King ignores all captures and removals from Spells effects for 1 turn.
II. Select an enemy chess piece except for the King and Queen. That piece will be removed immediately if:
- It moves.
- It gains an effect from a Spell.
name: Duality

description:
I. Select one of your Rooks. That Rook ignores all captures and removal from Spells. The effect lasts for 1 turn.
II. Switch your King with that Rook.
This card can be played even when your King is under check.
The effect can't be played on Kings outside of the one you started from the start of the match.
name: Immortal Defender

description:
I. Select your third or fourth lane. All the Pawns in that lane gain the following effects:
- Ignore all captures.
- Ignore all removals from Spells.
- After your opponent's turn ends, remove this chess piece.
name: Legion

description:
This card can only be used if you have no duplicates of any cards in your deck.
I. Give the enemy leader the following effect: "You can only move Pawns, this effect lasts for 4 turns".
II. This card can't be duplicated by card effects.
name: One Hope

description:
I. Discard 2 cards in your hand.
II. Select one of your chess pieces, it can move twice per turn for the next 3 turns.
name: Conservative Breakthrough

description: I. Select a chess piece, return it to its starting position. (If a piece is present in their original position, that piece can't be selected)
name: Spring Trap

description:
This card can only be used if this is your 20th turn or later.
I. Give the enemy leader the followijg effect: "All of your Pawns can't choose to promote into a Queen, this effect lasts for the whole match". (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Empty Journey

description:
I. Remove one of your Queens
II. Draw cards until you have 9 cards in your hand.
III. This card will not end your turn.
name: Offering to the Darkness

description:
I. Select a card in your hand (excluding "Pledge to the Light"). Shuffle 3 copies of the selected card into your deck and discard the selected card.
II. Draw a card.
name: Pledge to the Light

description:
I. Give your leader the following effect: "At the end of your turn, draw a card, the effect lasts for 4 turn".
II. Discard a card in your hand.
name: Steady Harvest

description:
I. Your leader has the following effects for 7 turns:
- You hand size is set to 3. 
- Once per turn, you can use a card without ending your turn. 
- Draw a card after your turn ends."
II. If you have more than 3 cards when this card is used, discard all other cards except for the first 3 cards in your hand.
name: Cruel Crusade

description: I. Draw X cards. X equals to the number of times you drawn cards through card effects during this match.
name: Snowball of Purpose

description:
I. Your leader has the following effect: "The next time your opponent discards cards, draw a card". 
II. This card will not end your turn.
name: Pillaging Efforts

description:
I. Draw a card. Activate the corresponding effect to the card drawn.
- Card without the ability to discard: Discard this card, perform 1 more action this turn.
- Card with the ability to discard: Give that card the following effect: "This card will not end your turn".
name: Blind Bet

description:
This card can only be used if you have 1 other card in your hand.
I. Discard a card in your hand.
II. The enemy leader chooses a card to be discarded, the corresponding effect will activate depending on the discarded card.
- A card with turn restriction: Nothing happens.
- A card without turn restriction: Select and discard 2 more cards in your hand.
name: Futile Struggle

description: I. The next time your opponent discards cards, add the discarded cards into your hand instead.
name: Planned Raid

description:
I. Discard a card in your hand and select a card in your hand, that card can't be discarded.
This effect lasts for 9 turns.
name: Answered Prayer

description:
This card can it be used if you have at least 9 other cards in your hand.
I. Discard your hand.
II. +50 hand size, you can't increase your hand size for the whole match. The effect can't be removed regardless of method. (This effect can't be stacked)
III. This card will not end your turn if used.
name: Ultimate Sacrifice

description:
I. -1 turn count for both leaders
II. Restore all captured and removed chess pieces from the previous turn.
III. Perform 2 more actions.
name: Fatal Alter

description: I. If this card is drawn, end your turn.
name: Distraught Nightmare

description:
This card will automatically be used after 6 turns has passed.
I. All other cards you have in your deck that has the same abilities will be discarded until only 1 copy of it remain.
name: Cursed Promise

description:
After 7 turns this card will discard itself. I. This card can only be discarded by enemy spells or by itself. 
II. While this card is in your hand, your leader has the following effect: "All spells you use will skip your next turn without drawing cards, if that spell already has the ability to skip your turns, add 1 more to the amount it will skip.
name: Frozen Soul

description: I. While this card is in your hand, your leader has the following effect: "All cards in your deck and hand except this card will have a 25 turn restriction".
name: Suffering Beyond Agony

description:
I. Remove all Lucy's Forbidden Power cards from your hand and deck. 
II. All remaining leader effects given by cards from Lucy's Forbidden Power will be removed.
name: Resolution of Salvation

description:
I. While this card is in your hand, your leader has the following effect: "If there are no cards from Lucy's Forbidden Power in your deck, at the end of your turn, activate the following effects.
- Shuffle a "Flamenugget" into your opponent's deck, that "Flamenugget" will not discard their hand nor skip their turn.
- Shuffle 2 "Pondering" into your deck.
name: Lullaby of Armageddon

description:
I. Discard 3 cards in your hand.
II. Increase your turn count by 5
name: Travelling Marvelously

description:
I. Reveal the top 5 cards in your deck. Discard them. Shuffle the cards back to your deck instead if the following requirement is fulfilled:
- Have at least 1 card from Lucy's Forbidden Power drawn.
II. During your next turn, draw 5 cards.
name: Spellbound Energy Check

description:
I. Give your leader the following effect: "For the next 4 turns, draw a card at the start of your turn. After drawing, select one of the following actions to be performed:
- Keep the drawn card.
- Give the drawn card to the opponent.
If the second action is performed, the next time cards are drawn by your opponent, the drawn cards are given to you instead". (This effect can be stacked) (The effect resolves before the default draw.)
name: Luck Manipulation

description:
I. Give your leader the following effect: "The next time your turn is skipped by your own card effects, perform the following effects instead.
- Nullify the skip turn effect.
- Draw a card." (These effects can stack)
name: Energy Salvage

description:
I. Skip your next turn without drawing card.
II. You may skip your opponent's current turn or their next turn anytime desired. This choice will stay in play until used. The effect will not end your turn if used on your turn. (If your enemy leader is using a card while this effect activates, discard that card)
name: Energy Pact

description: I. Give your leader the following effect: "The next time you end your turn,  select a card still in your deck, draw it".
name: Rigged Guidance

description:
I. Discard a token in your hand that doesn't come from Lucy's Forbidden Power.
II. Select a token in your deck, draw it and a put a copy of it into your deck.
name: Boundaries of Alchemy

description:
You can only play this card if you fulfilled the following requirement below:
- Play at least 3 other cards in a row for 3 turns while this card is in your hand. 
I. Draw 3 cards.
II. Increase your turn timer by 3.
III. Remove 3 chess pieces of choice except for the Queen and King. 
IV. This card will reset the number of cards played in a row.
name: The Lucky Triples

description: I. Transform all other cards in both player' hands to "A Gallon of Water".
name: Some Refreshing Water

description:
I. Discard 1 random "A Gallon of Water" from your opponent's hand.
II. Increase your turn count by 1.
name: A Gallon of Water

description:
If this card is used, select one of the effects to activate.
Effect 1: This effect can only be selected on your 12th turn or later. Put an "Echoing Resentments" into your hand. 
Effect 2: Draw a card.
name: Spellbook of Voices

description:
I. Select a card in your hand that does not has the one card per deck restriction, put copies of it until your hand is full.
II. Discard all other cards in your hand except the selected card and its copies.
name: Echoing Resentments

description:
This card can only be used on your 20th turn or later.
I. Transform all cards in both players' decks into "Pondering" cards.
name: Awkward Tactician

description:
This card can only be used on your 7th turn or later.
I. Give your leader the following effect: "All of your Pawns including summoned ones can't be targeted by opponent Spells if they are in your second, seventh or eighth lane, this effect lasts for the whole match".
name: Lucky Kingdom

description:
I. Reduce your turn count by 3.
II. Draw 3 cards.
name: Bargain of Time

description:
This card can only be used on your 13th turn or later.
I. Give both leaders the following effect: "Turn count increases by 2 instead of 1 for both players at the start of each of their turns."
name: Hastened Timelines

description: I. Increase your hand size by 2.
name: Extended Strategies

description: I. Give your leader the following effect: "All of your Knights that will come into play from card effects can choose to move forward one space after moving normally, this effect lasts for the rest of the match." (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Centaur Transformation

description:
I. Discard a card in your hand.
II. Draw a card.
III. Put a copy of the drawn card into your hand.
name: Altered Discovery

description: I. Transform all "Pondering" cards in both players' hand into random cards that are still in their deck.
name: Brilliant Ideas

description:
I. Select a card in your hand, put any amount of copies of it into your deck. To the max, 5.
II. Shuffle X Pondering into your deck. X equals to the chosen amount shuffled.
name: Disturbed Plans

description: I. Give your leader the following effect: "Lose the ability to move chess pieces for 4 turns; after 5 turns, all of your chess pieces (excluding those which will come into play from card effects and transformed pieces) can move twice, this effect will last for the rest of the match". (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Raging Anger

description:
This card can only be used if you have at least 5 other cards in your hand.
I. Discard your hand. 
II. Remove all other leader effects from both leaders.
name: Trickery of the Jesters

description:
I. Reduce your turn count by 2
II. Discard a card in your hand.
III. Select any turn based effect from any leader. Increase its duration by 4.
IV. You can't use cards for the next 2 turns.
name: Favoured Downfall

description:
I. Draw a card.
II. Increase your turn count by 1.
name: Joy of Celebration

description:
I. Give your leader the following effect: "The corresponding effect will activate depending on the next piece you capture:
- Pawn: The next 2 cards you draw regardless of method will be discarded.
- Non-Pawns: Draw 4 cards." (This effect can stack)
name: Bounty

description:
This card can only be used on your 17th turn or later.
I. Put a "Final Stance" into your hand.
II. Draw 2 cards.
name: Hardened Will

description:
I. Your Queen will be immune to captures if its being captured while this effect is in play. This effect last for 4 turns. (This effect can stack)
II. Give the leader the following effect: "Any chess piece that lands on your last lane can be promoted except for your King, this effect lasts for the rest of the match." (This effect can't be stacked)
This card can be used without any Queen in play.
name: Final Stance

description:
This card can only be used on your 5th turn or later.
I. Reduce your turn count by 3.
II. Reduce your opponent's turn count by 5.
name: Miraculous Rewind

description:
This card can only be used on your 12th turn or later.
I. Give your leader the following effect: "At end of each of your turns, draw a card; during the start of your turn, remove all of your chess pieces except for your King and Pawns if your deck only has 15 cards or less. These effects last for the rest of the match." (These effects can be stacked)
name: Overflowing Greed

description: I. Give your leader the following effect: "The next time your cards are discarded by an effect, draw the same amount as the discarded amount".
name: Counterfeit

description:
I. Discard a card in your hand.
II. Remove one of your Pawns or one of your opponent's Pawns.
name: Weakened Morale

description:
I. If your deck has at least one card that has no duplicates at the start of the match, put a copy of a random card that meets all the following conditions into your hand:
- Still in deck.
- Has no duplicates inside deck from start of match.
name: Sudden Discovery

description: I. Select one of your chess pieces, whenever that chess piece moves you draw a card, this effect lasts for the rest of the match. (This effect can be stacked)
name: Footsteps of the Steady

description: I. Select a Pawn you control, it will ignore a capture while this effect is in play, after this effect activates, remove this effect. This effect lasts for the rest of the match. (This effect can be stacked)
name: Spare Shield

description:
This card can only be used if at least one of your Bishops isn't in your first lane and if there is a targetable Bishop in both sides.
I. Transform one of your Bishop into a Pawn, select and remove one of your opponent's Bishops.
name: Demolishing Faith

description:
You can only use this card if your King has performed a castling in this match
I. Remove one of your Rooks 
II. Your King will ignore a capture if its being captured for the first time, this effect lasts the rest of the game. (This effect can't be stacked)
III. Discard a card in your hand.
name: Reign of the Wicked

description:
I. Select one of your chess pieces, for the next 2 turns, it is not visible for your opponent. 
The card discards itself if you have 6 chess pieces or less in your control.
name: Under the Shadows

description:
I. Allow your King to perform castling with any piece on the first row of your board. Cannot be played if:
- A Check or Checkmate is occurring.
- If the piece that is swapped with can be captured.
- If you already performed castling this match.
name: Benevolent Exchange

description:
I. Give the enemy leader the following effect: "The next time use you a card:
- Discard it before the effect activates. 
- Draw a card". (This effect can stack)
Each deck can only have one copy of this card.
name: Banishing Scroll

description:
I. Both players discard their hand. 
II. Both players draw a card.
name: Enraged Strike

description:
I. Draw 5 cards.
II. Reveal one of the five cards. drawn through this effect.
III. Discard the first and last card drawn through this effect.
name: Nut of the Fallen

description:
I. Select a card with a turn restriction of 16 or less in your hand, it gains the following effects:
- At the end of this turn, reveal that card to your opponent.
- Remove its turn restriction.
II. Skip your next turn.
This effect will last for 4 turns.
name: Forgotten Prayer

description:
I. Discard a card in your hand.
II. Put a random card (excluding Offering of Alchemy) with the nearer-higher rarity than the discarded card.
name: Offering of Alchemy

description:
I. Remove one of your Pawns.
II. Select one of your Knights, it can move two times per turn for the next 3 turns. (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Steadfast Boots

description: I. Give the enemy leader the following effect: "You can't use cards for the next 2 turns".
name: Silence

description:
This card can only be used if you have at least 1 King and 1 Queen.
I. For the next 4 turns:
- Your King can only move identically as your Queen.
- Your Queen can only move identically as your King.
name: Betrayal of Affairs

description: I. All chess pieces in your fourth lane will be pushed towards to your fourth leftmost tile, all chess pieces before the rightmost piece are removed, immune pieces pushes the rightmost piece towards the right by one tile for each immune piece.
name: Windfall

description:
I. Draw 2 cards.
II. You can't move chess pieces in your next turn.
III. Shuffle a copy of "Stingy Upkeep" into your deck.
name: Stingy Upkeep

description:
You can only play this card if you have at least 4 other cards in your hand.
I. Choose and remove a leader effect for you. You may repeat this as many times as you need.
II. Skip your next turn without drawing a card.
III. Discard 4 cards in your hand.
name: Chains of the Insane

description: I. Gain the following leader effect: "The next time a Pawn comes into play from your card effects, transform it into a Rook".
name: Strengthened Rise

description:
This card can only be used if at least one Pawn has been captured during this match.
I. Summon a Pawn in your second or third lane, if a chess piece is in the selected tile, remove it before summoning.
Each deck can only have 1 copy of this card.
name: Beyond the Grave

description:
This card can only be used on your 20th turn or later.
I. All chess pieces in the fourth and fifth lane will be removed.
Each deck can only have 1 copy of this card.
name: Earthquake

description: Remove all effects on a chess piece except for transformation and immunity effects.
name: Goblet of Blood

description: I. Does nothing.
name: Pondering

description: I. Draw 2 cards.
name: Assembly March

description:
I. Remove one of your chess pieces except the King or Queen.
II. Choose a same type of chess piece as the removed piece for your opponent, remove that piece.
name: Voodoo Doll

description:
This card can only be used in your 10th turn or later.
I. Randomly put one of the following cards into your hand.
- Flamenugget
- Hrog'qua 
- Peacegrant 
II. Skip your next turn.
name: Forgotten Artifacts

description:
I. Select a chess piece and move it 3 times.
II. Discard your hand.
III. Skip your next turn.
name: Flamenugget

description:
I. For the next 3 turns:
- The player can only move chess pieces.
- The opponent can only use cards.
name: Peacegrant

description: I. Select one of your chess pieces except the King or Queen, if that chess piece is captured, the capturing piece will be removed. This effect lasts for the whole match. (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Undying Loyalty

description: Your opponent can perform two actions next turn  you can move any enemy chess piece at the start of your next turn but can't move your own chess pieces.
name: Grasp of Time

description: I. Summon a Pawn in your half of the board.
name: Recruitment

description:
This card can only be used if your King is in Check while this card is in your hand.
I. This card will automatically be used if no cards were used this match.
II. All empty tiles surrounding your King will be randomly replaced with chess pieces that has been captured or removed through card effects during the match.
III. Give all chess pieces summoned this turn the following effect: "Remove this chess piece after 3 turns".
name: Revival Aegis

description:
I. You can't move chess pieces in your next turn.
II. Draw 3 cards.
name: Unlocking Knowledge

description: If no Pawns you control have been defeated during this match, select a Pawn you control, remove all other Pawns you control, that Pawn is immune to all damage including card effects, it can only move once per two turns.
name: Blitzkrieg

description:
This card can only be used on your 15th turn or later.
I. Gain the following effects: "All white tiles your chess pieces land on will allow you to draw a card; all black tiles will remove the chess piece that lands on it". (These effects can't be stacked)
name: Forbidden Lands

description:
I. Remove up to 3 Pawns of choice in your half of the board.
II. For each Pawn removed, draw a card.
name: Retirement

description:
You can only use this card if you have at least 1 Queen and 1 Knight.
I. Remove one of your Queens and one of your Knights.
II. Gain the following effects: "All of your Pawns will ignore a capture if its being captured for while this effect is in play. After this effect activates, remove all effects on that Pawn, this effect affects Pawns that will come into play". (This effect can't be stacked)
III. Gain the following effects: "All of your Pawns will ignore removals from Spells once if its being targeted while this effect is in play. After this effect activates, remove all effects on that Pawn, this effect will affect Pawns that will come into play". (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Cursed Codex of Protection

description:
I. Remove an enemy Pawn
II. During your next turn, a Pawn can move twice.
name: Claymore of Rush

description:
This card can only be used on your 13th turn or later.
I. Give all cards currently in both players' hands the following effect:
- Return this card into your deck instead of activating its effect.
name: Chronos: Genesis

description:
This card can only be used on your 8th turn or later.
I. Shuffle one of each Lucy's Forbidden Power cards into your deck.
name: Lucy's Forbidden Power

description:
You can only use this card if you played a card in your previous turn.
I. Remove a Pawn of choice in your fourth or fifth lane
II. Select an empty tile in your second lane, summon a Pawn.
name: An Accurate Arrow, a Swift Sway

description:
I. Select an empty tile in your second lane, summon a Pawn in the selected tile.
II. Draw a card.
name: Slave's Escape

description:
I. Remove one of your Knights.
II. Draw 2 cards.
III. This card will not end your turn if used.
name: Cannibal's Request

description:
I. Select a card in your hand that has its requirements fulfilled, if any. Play that card.
II. Skip your next 2 turns without drawing cards.
III. This card will not end your turn.
name: Swift Assault

description: I. Put 2 "Recruitment" into your hand.
name: Dawn's Arrival

description:
I. For the next 3 turns:
- All chess piece captures that will occur will remove the capturing piece too.
name: Safe Approach

description:
This card can only be used if you have at least 3 Pawns.
I. Remove 3 of your Pawns.
II. Remove an enemy Knight, Bishop or Rook.
name: Blood Oath

description:
I. You can perform two actions in the next 6 turns including this turn.
II. You can't use cards for the next 15 turns.
name: Hrog'qua

description: I. Remove all effects on a chess piece except for transformation and immunity effects.
name: Purifying Blast

description: I. Select a tile without a chess piece. For the next 8 turns, that tile will remove all chess pieces that land on that tile.
name: Devil's Pit

description:
This card can only be used if you only have one Pawn in play.
I. Transform one of your Pawns into a King.
name: Forgotten Sibling

description:
This card can only be used if you have at least 5 Pawns in play.
I. Select one of your Pawns. The selected Pawn will gain the following effects. (These effects can't stacked)
- Can't be captured
- Can't be removed through card effects.
- Can't be transformed through card effects.
II. Remove all Pawns except for the selected Pawn.
name: Ritual of Strength

description: I. All of your Bishops become Rooks.
name: Fort's Barrage

description:
I. Transform all Pawns adjacent to your Queen into Knights.
This effect will not activate for Queens that are promoted from Pawns or summoned through card effects.
name: Knighthood

description: I. During your next turn, all your Knights can move 2 times.
name: Knight's Courage

description:
I. During your opponent's next turn, they can only move your chess pieces.
II. During your next turn, you can only move your opponent's chess pieces.
name: Reversal of Roles

description:
I. Transform all of your Pawns into Knights.
II. Gain the following effect: - After 8 turns, remove all of your Knights. (This effect can't be stacked)
III. Gain the following effect: - For 8 turns, all Pawns that come into play from your card effects will transform into a Knight. (This effect can't be stacked)
name: Cursed Blade

description:
I. Remove either one of your Knights, Bishops or Rooks.
II. Place two Pawns of choice in your second or third lane.
III. Draw a card.
name: Gauntlet of Inheritance

description:
This card can only be used if at least 2 Knight, 2 Bishops and 2 Rooks has been captured or removed through card effects.
I. Summon a Knight, Bishop and Rook in your first lane, placed by choice.
name: Desperate Defence

description:
This card can only be used if your opponent has 15 cards or less in their deck.
I. Draw 5 cards.
II. This card will not end your turn.
name: Fortification of Prosperity

description: I. Gain the following effects: "All your Pawns can capture forward; all your Pawns loses the ability to capture diagonally". (These effects can't be stacked)
name: Golden Spear

description:
This card can only be used if you only have one of each chess piece type, if at least one type is less or more than one, this card can't be used.
I. All of your chess pieces are immune from being captured for the whole match. (These effects can't be stacked)
name: Kingdom of Solitude

description:
This card can only be used on your 7th turn or later.
I. Select one of your Pawns, it can move two times per turn for the whole match. (These effects can't be stacked)
name: Nature's Blessing

description:
I. Select a card in your hand that has its requirements fulfilled, if any. Play that card.
II. This card will not end your turn.
This card is a token only obtained at start of match if you start as Black.
name: Black's Heirloom
